title: Get position packages
description: Returns a set of position package tiers

query.name: category_id
query.description: Used to determine pricing based on category if applicable

query.name: position_id
query.description: Used when editing a position to ensure you get the version of package data included when the position was created

query.name: return_metadata
query.description: Should be provided if we want to return metadata about the PackageSetVersion

query.name: skip_current_agent
query.description: Used when want to get all packages tiers as an anonymous member

fields.name: PackageSetVersionMetadata
fields.description: Metadata about the package set, only returned if requested

fields.name: PackageSetVersionId
fields.type:
PackageSetVersionId 
 Integer 

The package set version ID
fields.description: Integer

fields.name: PackageSetVersionId
fields.description: The package set version ID

fields.name: PackageData
fields.description: List of position packages

fields.name: Tier
fields.type:
Tier 
 Enumeration 

The type of package tier



 DisplayName 
 String or null 

The display name for the package tier



 PriceGstExcluded 
 Number 

The price of the package tier excluding GST



 PriceGstIncluded 
 Number 

The price of the package tier including GST



 HighlightFlagValue 
 String or null 

The highlight flag for the package tier



 Featured 
 Boolean 

Whether the package tier is featured



 AllowsBranding 
 Boolean 

Whether the package tier allows branding



 AllowsPhotos 
 Boolean 

Whether the package tier allows photos



 AllowsVideo 
 Boolean 

Whether the package tier allows video



 AllowsPromotedListing 
 Boolean 

Whether the package tier allows promoted listing



 DurationDays 
 Integer 

Duration of listings for the package tier



 CandidateSearchQuotaAdded 
 Integer 

Candidate search quota for listings in the package tier



 ProvidingSource 
 <FeeItemProvidingSource> or null 

Listing fee providing source for the package tier






 Name 
 String or null 

The name of the providing source.



 Remaining 
 Integer 

The number of items remaining in this source, or 0 if the source is unlimited.



 IsUnlimited 
 Boolean 

True if it is possible to create unlimited listings at the provided rate






 GroupName 
 String or null 

The group name for the package tier
fields.description: Enumeration
